Mosquito-0.1.0.0: A stateless LCF-style implementation of higher-order logic in Haskell.

Description

Derived, useful theorems --- direct consequences of the primitive inference rules defined in the kernel.

Lambda-abstraction

abstractsR :: [(String, Type)] -> Theorem -> Inference Theorem

Generalised for of abstract, performing many abstractions one after the other.
